item.title: 多智能体系统(COMP310)
item.description: Intelligent Agents Agents are objects with attitude, which are autonomous, smart, active. Properties in Environment (环境性质描述) Fully observable / partially observable Deterministic / non-deterministic Static / dynamic Discrete / continuous Episodic / non-episodic Real time Social ability (社交能力) The ability to interact with other agents via cooperation, coordination, and negotiation. Abstract Architectures for Agents (代理的
